MemberSignature.Value: public void UpdatePublishedData (string description, string presentityType);
.method public hidebysig instance void UpdatePublishedData(string description, string presentityType) cil managed
Public Sub UpdatePublishedData (description As String, presentityType As String)
public: void UpdatePublishedData(System::String ^ description, System::String ^ presentityType);

Docs.summary: Updates presence data that was automatically published by the endpoint.

remarks.para: Publication may be delayed if certain servers are unreachable. This operation involves re-publishing the instance that is published in container 0 with the presentity and description attributes updated with the new values.

Docs.exception: Thrown if endpoint is established without enabling automatic presence publishing.
